content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line at (-2.0, -76.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -2.0, -76.0) mining iron ore
- Iron chest (position -1.5, -74.5) storing iron ore
- Burner inserter (position -0.5, -74.5) to move items from chest
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, -77.0) for smelting iron ore

### Copper/Iron Production Line at (-21.0, -73.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -21.0, -73.0) mining copper and iron ore
- Iron chest (position -21.5, -74.5) for storing ore
- Burner inserter (position -20.5, -74.5) to move items
- Stone furnace (position -19.0, -74.0) for smelting ore

### Standalone Furnaces at (3.0, -73.0)
Two connected furnaces:
- Stone furnace (position 3.0, -73.0)
- Stone furnace (position 5.0, -73.0)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied spaces
- Before placing an inserter or any other entity, check if the target position is already occupied by another entity
- At step 56, attempt to place burner-inserter at (-1.5, -75.5) failed because the space was occupied
- Use the entity map data to verify if a position is free before attempting placement

### Resource Management Issues
- Mining drill at (-21.0, -73.0) has run out of fuel and stopped working
- Ensure mining drills are regularly supplied with fuel to maintain continuous operation

### System Efficiency Issues
- Multiple furnaces are idle with "no ingredients to smelt" warning
- Ensure proper connection between resource extraction and processing facilities
- Set up proper logistics chains to keep furnaces supplied with materials
